title: Pushing the Limits
description: Rafe knows he wants Nicole from the moment he lays eyes on her… but will Nicole ever agree to give up her freedom – and for such a dangerously unpredictable man?The first installment in a series starring Rafe, a striking playboy heir with a secret, and Nicole – the beautiful and headstrong niece of CC Gibbs’ famous hero Dominic Knight from her bestselling Knight trilogy.Book 1 in Rafe & Nicole's story.UK edition.
author: C.C. Gibbs
